About

Born and raised in Wodonga Victoria, I worked with WEB MATRIX for 11 years working remotely from different locations around Australia. I moved on to head of development for Bwired located in Prahran where my responsibilities shifted to overseeing local and overseas teams. My skill base extended to helping with build tools as well as cross-browser compatibility and strong knowledge of building templates for desktop/mobile on open source solutions like Dot Net Nuke, Joomla, Wordpress & Drupal. I have experience with React, React Native and Vue.

My most recent position is with Revium leading the front end team looking afte people management, code reviews and setting up standards and processes. I enjoy the challenges that come with being a front end developer, especially with complex and large jobs. I find it satisfying to work out ways to find the most efficient and best solutions possible.

What I love

  • My wife
  • Playing, creating music
  • Sketch
  • Animation (achieveing 60fps)
  • Interesting approaches to UI/UX

What I know


Markup, languages and frameworks

  • Html, Css, JavaScript, Sass/Less, Gulp, Webpack, Git, React, React Native, Angular, Vue, Nuxt, PHP, Node

CMS

  • Wordpress, Drupal, Dotnet Nuke, Coredna, Kentico, Contentful

Server

  • Docker, NGINX, Azure, AWS

Nintendo.com.au

Working with a team of 7 people, together we built a new site from the ground up using Coredna. My responsibilities for this project include

  • Communicating with marketing and design teams.
  • Code standards and quality assurance
  • Delegating tasks to remote employees
  • Making sure time lines are kept

Challenges

This project launched in multiple phases with the homepage, Wii U and 3ds pages launching first and then continuing work on support, help and games catalogue.

The approval process was lengthy with each phase so management of branches and sandboxes were key to making sure each phase launched successfully.

Visit nintendo.com.au

Chw.net.au

Rebuild of the site moving from a static build process to a single page app hosted via IIS and leveraging a pre renderer for SEO

  • Solution design for search using Azure search
  • Created solution for kentico to pass data to front end via webapi
  • Code standards and quality assurance
